content.text:
Create a new Linear initiative with full project and issue stub structure.

## Steps:
1. Use Linear MCP to create the initiative
2. Ask for project breakdown (or analyze description for suggestions)
3. For each project:
   - Create project in Linear
   - Ask for/suggest issue breakdown
   - Create issue stubs
4. Generate dependency graph structure:
   - Create graph.json with all entities
   - Identify and map dependencies
   - Generate initial Mermaid visualization
5. Create living document structure:
   - Initiative plan with goals and constraints
   - Project plan stubs with phases
   - Issue plan stubs with basic info
6. Set up tracking:
   - Store Linear IDs and UUIDs
   - Create context/current.json
   - Update index.md

## Interactive Process:
- Describe the initiative's goals and success criteria
- List major projects/features needed
- For each project, identify key issues/tasks
- Define dependencies between projects
- Set priority and timeline estimates

## Output:
- Full Linear hierarchy created
- Living document stubs ready for elaboration
- Dependency graph for navigation
- Ready to start work with @linear/work-context.md

ARGUMENTS: Voice Memo Processing System

Hello, Ojash. Ready to write some awesome code!

I'll help you create a Linear initiative for the Voice Memo Processing System. Let me start by creating the initiative in Linear.
Now let me create the initiative for Voice Memo Processing System:

input.name: Voice Memo Processing System
input.summary: AI-powered system to transcribe voice memos, extract key information, and integrate with PKM workflow
input.description:
# Voice Memo Processing System

## Overview
An AI-powered system to process voice memos by transcribing them, extracting key information (tasks, ideas, notes), and integrating them into the personal knowledge management workflow.

## Goals
- Enable seamless capture of thoughts and ideas through voice
- Automatically extract actionable items and insights
- Integrate processed content into existing PKM system
- Support multiple audio formats and sources

## Success Criteria
- Accurate transcription with speaker identification
- Intelligent extraction of tasks, ideas, and key points
- Smooth integration with memo and chat systems
- Processing time under 30 seconds for 5-minute recordings

Based on the existing issues, I can see you have:
1. **PKM-41**: Implement Memo Transcription Pipeline (audio to text conversion)
2. **PKM-42**: Create Memo Parser Agent (extract structured info from transcriptions)
3. **PKM-43**: Implement Parsing Template Management (dynamic parsing templates)

## Suggested Additional Issues for Complete Voice Memo Processing System:

### Core Infrastructure
- **Audio File Upload & Storage**: API endpoints and storage solution for audio files
- **Processing Queue System**: Background job queue for async transcription/parsing
- **Webhook Integration**: Support for voice memo sources (iOS Shortcuts, Google Assistant)

### Frontend Components
- **Voice Memo List View**: Display all voice memos with playback controls
- **Voice Memo Details Page**: Show transcription, parsed data, and editing UI
- **Recording Interface**: Web-based voice recording with real-time feedback

### Integration & Enhancement
- **Memo-to-Activity Converter**: Transform parsed memos into activity entries
- **Memo-to-Task Extractor**: Extract TODO items and create tasks
- **Duplicate Detection**: Identify similar/duplicate voice memos
- **Batch Processing**: Process multiple voice memos at once

### Analytics & Reporting
- **Processing Analytics**: Track success rates, processing times, quality metrics
- **Voice Memo Search**: Full-text search across transcriptions
- **Export Functionality**: Export voice memos to various formats

input.title: Audio File Upload & Storage
input.description:
## Voice Memo Processing - Audio File Upload & Storage

**Purpose**: Provide API endpoints and storage solution for audio files

### Implementation Requirements:

- [ ] Create `/api/voice-memos/upload` endpoint accepting audio files
- [ ] Support common audio formats (MP3, M4A, WAV, WEBM)
- [ ] Implement file size limits and validation
- [ ] Store audio files in cloud storage (S3 or compatible)
- [ ] Generate unique identifiers for each upload
- [ ] Create database record linking audio file to user

### Technical Details:
- Maximum file size: 50MB
- Supported formats: MP3, M4A, WAV, WEBM, OGG
- Storage strategy: Cloud storage with local caching
- File naming: UUID-based with original extension

### Acceptance Criteria:

- [ ] Upload endpoint accepts multipart form data
- [ ] File validation prevents invalid formats/sizes
- [ ] Files stored securely with proper access controls
- [ ] Database record created with metadata
- [ ] Return upload status and file ID
- [ ] Error handling for failed uploads

### Priority: High

Core infrastructure for voice memo processing.

input.title: Processing Queue System
input.description:
## Voice Memo Processing - Processing Queue System

**Purpose**: Background job queue for asynchronous transcription and parsing

### Implementation Requirements:

- [ ] Implement Celery or similar task queue system
- [ ] Create queue workers for transcription tasks
- [ ] Create queue workers for parsing tasks
- [ ] Implement retry logic with exponential backoff
- [ ] Add task status tracking and monitoring
- [ ] Create dead letter queue for failed tasks

### Technical Details:
- Queue technology: Celery with Redis/RabbitMQ
- Worker concurrency: Configurable (default: 4)
- Task timeout: 5 minutes for transcription, 1 minute for parsing
- Retry strategy: 3 attempts with exponential backoff

### Queue Tasks:
1. `process_voice_memo`: Main orchestration task
2. `transcribe_audio`: Audio to text conversion
3. `parse_transcription`: Extract structured data
4. `notify_completion`: Send completion notifications

### Acceptance Criteria:

- [ ] Queue system deployed and operational
- [ ] Tasks processed asynchronously
- [ ] Failed tasks retry automatically
- [ ] Task status queryable via API
- [ ] Monitoring dashboard available
- [ ] Dead letter queue handles persistent failures

### Priority: High

Essential for scalable voice memo processing.

input.title: Webhook Integration
input.description:
## Voice Memo Processing - Webhook Integration

**Purpose**: Support voice memo ingestion from external sources

### Implementation Requirements:

- [ ] Create webhook endpoint `/api/webhooks/voice-memo`
- [ ] Support iOS Shortcuts integration
- [ ] Support Google Assistant/IFTTT webhooks
- [ ] Support Zapier/Make.com webhooks
- [ ] Implement webhook authentication (API keys/signatures)
- [ ] Add webhook event logging and debugging

### Integration Sources:
1. **iOS Shortcuts**: Direct audio file upload
2. **Google Assistant**: Via IFTTT webhook
3. **Zapier**: Multi-source integration
4. **Make.com**: Automation workflows
5. **Custom integrations**: API key based

### Webhook Payload Format:
```json
{
  "source": "ios-shortcuts|google-assistant|zapier|custom",
  "audio_url": "https://...",
  "audio_base64": "...",
  "metadata": {
    "timestamp": "ISO-8601",
    "duration": 123,
    "user_context": "optional context"
  }
}
```

### Acceptance Criteria:

- [ ] Webhook endpoint accepts multiple formats
- [ ] Authentication prevents unauthorized access
- [ ] External audio files downloaded and processed
- [ ] Base64 audio data decoded and stored
- [ ] Event logging tracks all webhook calls
- [ ] Documentation for each integration source

### Priority: Medium

Enables seamless voice memo capture from multiple sources.

input.title: Voice Memo List View
input.description:
## Voice Memo Processing - Voice Memo List View

**Purpose**: Frontend component to display all voice memos with playback controls

### Implementation Requirements:

- [ ] Create `/voice-memos` route in Next.js frontend
- [ ] Design responsive list view with cards/table toggle
- [ ] Implement audio playback controls (play/pause/seek)
- [ ] Show transcription preview (first 100 chars)
- [ ] Display processing status (pending/processing/completed/failed)
- [ ] Add filtering by date, status, and search

### UI Components:
1. **VoiceMemoList**: Main container component
2. **VoiceMemoCard**: Individual memo display
3. **AudioPlayer**: Playback controls component
4. **ProcessingStatus**: Status indicator
5. **FilterBar**: Date range and status filters

### Features:
- Infinite scroll pagination
- Real-time status updates via WebSocket
- Bulk selection for batch operations
- Sort by date, duration, or status
- Quick actions (delete, reprocess, edit)

### Acceptance Criteria:

- [ ] List view displays all user's voice memos
- [ ] Audio playback works smoothly
- [ ] Status updates reflect processing state
- [ ] Filtering and search functional
- [ ] Responsive design works on mobile
- [ ] Performance optimized for 1000+ memos

### Priority: High

Essential user interface for voice memo management.

input.title: Voice Memo Details Page
input.description:
## Voice Memo Processing - Voice Memo Details Page

**Purpose**: Show full transcription, parsed data, and editing interface

### Implementation Requirements:

- [ ] Create `/voice-memos/[id]` dynamic route
- [ ] Display full audio player with waveform visualization
- [ ] Show complete transcription with edit capability
- [ ] Display parsed structured data in editable form
- [ ] Add re-processing button with updated templates
- [ ] Show processing history and timestamps

### Page Sections:
1. **Audio Section**: Player with waveform and controls
2. **Transcription Section**: Full text with edit mode
3. **Parsed Data Section**: Structured fields editor
4. **Metadata Section**: File info, timestamps, processing history
5. **Actions Section**: Save, reprocess, export, delete

### Features:
- Synchronized audio/text highlighting
- Transcription correction with diff tracking
- Parsed data validation and editing
- Export to various formats (JSON, Markdown, PDF)
- Link to related memos and activities

### Acceptance Criteria:

- [ ] Detail page loads with all memo data
- [ ] Audio player includes waveform visualization
- [ ] Transcription editable and saveable
- [ ] Parsed data fields update correctly
- [ ] Re-processing works with new templates
- [ ] Export functionality produces valid files

### Priority: High

Core interface for memo review and correction.

input.title: Recording Interface
input.description:
## Voice Memo Processing - Recording Interface

**Purpose**: Web-based voice recording with real-time feedback

### Implementation Requirements:

- [ ] Create recording component using Web Audio API
- [ ] Implement real-time audio level visualization
- [ ] Add recording timer and size indicator
- [ ] Support pause/resume during recording
- [ ] Auto-save drafts to prevent data loss
- [ ] Add noise cancellation option

### Technical Implementation:
- Use MediaRecorder API for recording
- WebRTC for echo cancellation
- IndexedDB for draft storage
- Web Workers for audio processing
- Progressive enhancement for older browsers

### UI Components:
1. **RecordButton**: Main record/stop control
2. **AudioVisualizer**: Real-time waveform
3. **RecordingTimer**: Duration display
4. **RecordingControls**: Pause, cancel, settings
5. **RecordingPreview**: Playback before submit

### Features:
- One-click recording start
- Visual feedback during recording
- Auto-stop at 10 minutes
- Quality settings (bitrate selection)
- Background recording indicator
- Keyboard shortcuts (space to start/stop)

### Acceptance Criteria:

- [ ] Recording works in Chrome, Firefox, Safari
- [ ] Audio quality meets transcription requirements
- [ ] Visual feedback responsive and accurate
- [ ] Drafts survive page refresh
- [ ] Upload starts automatically on completion
- [ ] Graceful degradation for unsupported browsers

### Priority: Medium

Enables direct voice capture in the web app.

input.title: Memo-to-Activity Converter
input.description:
## Voice Memo Processing - Memo-to-Activity Converter

**Purpose**: Transform parsed voice memos into activity entries

### Implementation Requirements:

- [ ] Create conversion service in backend
- [ ] Map parsed memo fields to activity schema
- [ ] Handle ambiguous or incomplete data
- [ ] Support manual review before conversion
- [ ] Batch convert multiple memos
- [ ] Link activities back to source memos

### Conversion Rules:
1. **Activity Type**: Inferred from parsed content
2. **Duration**: Extracted from time indicators
3. **Subject**: Main topic from parsed data
4. **Tags**: Auto-generated from content
5. **Notes**: Original transcription reference

### Features:
- Smart field mapping with defaults
- Conflict resolution for duplicates
- Preview converted activities before save
- Bulk operations with selective conversion
- Undo/rollback capability
- Custom mapping rules per user

### Acceptance Criteria:

- [ ] Converter accurately maps memo to activity fields
- [ ] Preview shows before/after comparison
- [ ] Bulk conversion processes efficiently
- [ ] Activities maintain link to source memo
- [ ] Duplicate detection prevents redundancy
- [ ] Custom rules apply correctly

### Priority: Medium

Bridges voice input to activity tracking.

input.title: Memo-to-Task Extractor
input.description:
## Voice Memo Processing - Memo-to-Task Extractor

**Purpose**: Extract TODO items and create tasks from voice memos

### Implementation Requirements:

- [ ] Create task extraction service
- [ ] Identify action items in transcriptions
- [ ] Parse due dates and priorities
- [ ] Create tasks in task management system
- [ ] Support task templates and categories
- [ ] Handle task dependencies

### Extraction Patterns:
- "I need to..." â†’ Task
- "Remember to..." â†’ Task with reminder
- "By [date]..." â†’ Task with due date
- "Important/urgent..." â†’ High priority task
- "After [x], then..." â†’ Dependent tasks

### Features:
- Natural language task parsing
- Due date extraction and parsing
- Priority inference from keywords
- Batch task creation
- Task grouping by project/context
- Integration with existing task system

### Task Fields Extracted:
1. **Title**: Main action item
2. **Description**: Context from memo
3. **Due Date**: Parsed time references
4. **Priority**: Inferred from language
5. **Project**: Based on context/tags
6. **Dependencies**: Related tasks

### Acceptance Criteria:

- [ ] Extractor identifies tasks with 90%+ accuracy
- [ ] Due dates parsed correctly
- [ ] Tasks created in task system
- [ ] Batch processing handles multiple tasks
- [ ] User can review before creation
- [ ] Integration with Linear/task system works

### Priority: High

Critical for actionable voice memo processing.

input.title: Duplicate Detection
input.description:
## Voice Memo Processing - Duplicate Detection

**Purpose**: Identify similar or duplicate voice memos

### Implementation Requirements:

- [ ] Implement similarity comparison algorithm
- [ ] Use embeddings for semantic similarity
- [ ] Compare transcriptions and parsed data
- [ ] Flag potential duplicates for review
- [ ] Support merge operations for duplicates
- [ ] Maintain duplicate detection history

### Detection Methods:
1. **Exact Match**: Identical transcriptions
2. **Fuzzy Match**: Similar content (>90% similarity)
3. **Semantic Match**: Same meaning, different words
4. **Time-based**: Memos within 5 minutes
5. **Audio Match**: Similar audio fingerprints

### Features:
- Real-time duplicate checking on upload
- Batch duplicate scanning for existing memos
- Similarity score visualization
- Merge wizard for combining duplicates
- Ignore list for intentional duplicates
- Duplicate detection settings per user

### Acceptance Criteria:

- [ ] Detection catches 95%+ of duplicates
- [ ] False positive rate below 5%
- [ ] Real-time checking completes < 2 seconds
- [ ] Merge operation preserves all data
- [ ] UI clearly shows duplicate relationships
- [ ] Performance scales to 10,000+ memos

### Priority: Low

Quality of life improvement for heavy users.

# Voice Memo Processing System Initiative

## Overview
Build a comprehensive voice memo processing system that transforms audio recordings into structured, actionable data within the PKM ecosystem.

## Goals
- **Seamless Capture**: Enable voice memo capture from multiple sources (web, mobile, integrations)
- **Intelligent Processing**: Accurately transcribe and parse voice memos into structured data
- **Actionable Output**: Extract tasks, activities, and insights from voice content
- **Integration**: Deep integration with existing PKM features (memos, tasks, activities)

## Success Criteria
- [ ] 95%+ transcription accuracy for clear audio
- [ ] Processing time under 30 seconds for 5-minute recordings
- [ ] Support for multiple audio formats (MP3, M4A, WAV, WEBM)
- [ ] Successful extraction of tasks and activities with 90%+ accuracy
- [ ] Mobile-friendly interface for recording and review
- [ ] Integration with at least 3 external sources (iOS, Google Assistant, etc.)

## Constraints
- Must work within existing FastAPI/Next.js architecture
- Use OpenAI Whisper for transcription (existing integration)
- Maintain sub-second API response times for UI operations
- Support offline recording with sync when online
- Respect storage limits and implement cleanup policies

## Key Features
1. **Audio Management**: Upload, store, and manage voice recordings
2. **Transcription Pipeline**: Convert audio to text with high accuracy
3. **Intelligent Parsing**: Extract structured information using AI
4. **Task Extraction**: Identify and create actionable tasks
5. **Activity Tracking**: Convert voice memos to activity entries
6. **Mobile Experience**: Responsive recording and playback interface

## Project Structure
- [Project Plan](./plans/project-plan.md)
- [Implementation Issues](./plans/issues/)
- [Technical Architecture](./plans/architecture.md)
- [Dependency Graph](../../dependencies/voice-memo-dependencies.md)

## Linear Project
- **Project ID**: `0c082bd8-e315-42c9-839d-aabb4c522df2`
- **Project URL**: [Voice Memo Processing System](https://linear.app/pkm-assistant/project/voice-memo-processing-system-f31af6bf6d5c)

## Status: Planning Phase
Currently defining requirements and creating implementation issues.

input.content:
# Voice Memo Processing System - Project Plan

## Project Overview
Build the core voice-to-structured-data pipeline for the PKM assistant, enabling users to capture thoughts and tasks through voice recordings.

## Implementation Phases

### Phase 1: Core Infrastructure (Week 1-2)
**Goal**: Establish the foundation for audio file handling and processing

#### Issues
- [PKM-65](https://linear.app/pkm-assistant/issue/PKM-65): Audio File Upload & Storage
- [PKM-66](https://linear.app/pkm-assistant/issue/PKM-66): Processing Queue System

#### Deliverables
- Audio upload API endpoint
- File storage system (S3 or compatible)
- Background job queue with Celery
- Basic monitoring and logging

### Phase 2: Processing Pipeline (Week 2-3)
**Goal**: Implement the core transcription and parsing functionality

#### Issues
- [PKM-41](https://linear.app/pkm-assistant/issue/PKM-41): Memo Transcription Pipeline
- [PKM-43](https://linear.app/pkm-assistant/issue/PKM-43): Parsing Template Management
- [PKM-42](https://linear.app/pkm-assistant/issue/PKM-42): Memo Parser Agent

#### Deliverables
- Whisper integration for transcription
- Template system for parsing rules
- AI agent for structured data extraction
- Event system for processing notifications

### Phase 3: User Interface (Week 3-4)
**Goal**: Create the frontend for viewing and managing voice memos

#### Issues
- [PKM-68](https://linear.app/pkm-assistant/issue/PKM-68): Voice Memo List View
- [PKM-69](https://linear.app/pkm-assistant/issue/PKM-69): Voice Memo Details Page

#### Deliverables
- List view with audio playback
- Detailed view with editing capabilities
- Real-time status updates
- Mobile-responsive design

### Phase 4: Integration & Enhancement (Week 4-5)
**Goal**: Connect voice memos to the broader PKM system

#### Issues
- [PKM-72](https://linear.app/pkm-assistant/issue/PKM-72): Memo-to-Task Extractor
- [PKM-67](https://linear.app/pkm-assistant/issue/PKM-67): Webhook Integration
- [PKM-70](https://linear.app/pkm-assistant/issue/PKM-70): Recording Interface

#### Deliverables
- Task extraction and creation
- External source integration (iOS, Google)
- Web-based recording interface
- Integration documentation

### Phase 5: Advanced Features (Week 5-6)
**Goal**: Add quality-of-life improvements and advanced functionality

#### Issues
- [PKM-71](https://linear.app/pkm-assistant/issue/PKM-71): Memo-to-Activity Converter
- [PKM-74](https://linear.app/pkm-assistant/issue/PKM-74): Batch Processing
- [PKM-73](https://linear.app/pkm-assistant/issue/PKM-73): Duplicate Detection

#### Deliverables
- Activity generation from memos
- Batch upload and processing
- Duplicate detection system
- Performance optimizations

## Technical Architecture

### Backend Components
- **FastAPI Routes**: `/api/voice-memos/*`
- **Services**: TranscriptionService, ParserService, TaskExtractorService
- **Models**: VoiceMemoModel, TranscriptionModel, ParsedDataModel
- **Queue Tasks**: process_voice_memo, transcribe_audio, parse_transcription

### Frontend Components
- **Pages**: `/voice-memos`, `/voice-memos/[id]`
- **Components**: VoiceMemoList, AudioPlayer, RecordingInterface
- **State Management**: Zustand store for voice memo state
- **API Integration**: Generated client from OpenAPI spec

### External Integrations
- OpenAI Whisper API for transcription
- S3-compatible storage for audio files
- Webhook endpoints for iOS Shortcuts, IFTTT
- WebSocket for real-time updates

## Risk Mitigation

### Technical Risks
1. **Transcription Accuracy**: Mitigated by allowing manual corrections
2. **Processing Time**: Mitigated by queue system and progress indicators
3. **Storage Costs**: Mitigated by retention policies and compression

### User Experience Risks
1. **Complex UI**: Mitigated by phased rollout and user testing
2. **Mobile Performance**: Mitigated by progressive enhancement
3. **Data Loss**: Mitigated by auto-save and draft functionality

## Success Metrics
- Average transcription accuracy: >95%
- Processing time (p95): <30 seconds
- User adoption rate: 50% of active users
- Task extraction accuracy: >90%
- System uptime: 99.9%

## Dependencies
- Existing memo system for data model
- Template system for parsing rules
- Task management system for extracted tasks
- Activity tracking for converted activities
